inclusion.criterion: Subject has T2DM with no change in type/dose of diabetic medication in the last 3 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject's Albumin level is between 3.5 - 5.0 g/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject's Alanine transaminase (ALT) level is up to 36 U/L
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject's Aspartate transaminase (AST) level is < 41 U/L
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject's Alkaline phosphatase (ALP) level is < 130 U/L
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject is willing to comply with study procedures and is able to return to the clinic for scheduled visits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has history of recurrent hypoglycaemia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has history of malignancy (except skin cancer) during last 5 years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is currently receiving warfarin, steroids, cyclosporine or thyroxine
exclusion.label: unknown
